go_data.justification: The DDB1-CUL4-RBX1 (CRL4) ubiquitin ligase family regulates a diverse set of cellular pathways.
The DCAF DDB2 detects UV-induced pyrimidine dimers in the genome and facilitates nucleotide excision repair.
DDB2 receptor-mediated cyclobutane pyrimidine dimer recognition in chromatin.
